1.12.2.1.0.1: Fixed a bug with the Guardsman, that was causing users to crash.
1.12.2.1.0.2: Linked the mod to the Forge Version Checker, updated the Manchot texture, and made Swords actually extend ItemSword, instead of being a custom class.
1.12.2.1.0.3: Fixed a whole bunch of bugs with the Hailstorm module.
1.12.2.1.0.6: Structures added to the snow biomes!
